post.description: Authenticate user and return a token

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of clients with optional search and filter

post.summary: Create a new client with initial debt
post.description: Store a new client and their initial debt in the database

get.summary: Get a specific client with debt history
get.description: Retrieve a client's details and their debt history by ID

put.description: Update a client's details by ID

delete.description: Mark a client as deleted by setting is_deleted to true

post.description: Add a new debt or payment transaction for a client

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of firms with optional name search

post.summary: Create a new firm with initial debt
post.description: Store a new firm and its initial debt in the database

get.summary: Get a specific firm with debt history
get.description: Retrieve a firm's details and their debt history by ID

put.description: Update a firm's details by ID

delete.description: Mark a firm as deleted by setting is_deleted to true

post.summary: Add a debt transaction for a firm
post.description: Add a new debt or payment transaction for a firm

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of orders with optional date filter

post.description: Store a new order in the database

get.summary: Get a specific order with products
get.description: Retrieve an order's details and its products by ID

put.description: Update an order's day and recorded_by fields by ID

delete.description: Mark an order as deleted by setting is_deleted to true

get.description: Retrieve a list of products with optional name search

post.description: Store a new product in the database

get.description: Retrieve a product's details by ID

put.description: Update a product's details by ID

delete.description: Permanently delete a product by ID

get.description: Retrieve a list of workers with optional name search

post.description: Store a new worker in the database

get.summary: Get a specific worker with pays
get.description: Retrieve a worker's details and their payment history by ID

post.description: Update a worker's details by ID

delete.description: Permanently delete a worker and their pays by ID

post.summary: Add a payment or debt for a worker
post.description: Record a payment (oldi) or debt (berdi) for a worker
